CustomField.description:
This is an Additional Description of the Opportunity. The Opportunity Name has a Standard 30 Character Limit due to Quickbooks Charactor Limitations Because of this, additional information beyond the Initial Lead Date, Account Name, and Service Type should be entered here.
For Example: Fall/Winter Collection
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This is an Additional Description of the Opportunity. The Opportunity Name has a Standard 30 Character Limit due to Quickbooks Charactor Limitations Because of this, additional information beyond the Initial Lead Date, Account Name, and Service Type should be entered here.
For Example: Fall/Winter Collection
CustomField.label: Opportunity Descriptor
